group_1.textRight: Midori's place, huh...
When you said there was a place you wanted@to swing by, I was wonderin' where,
but it's the grave of that dead chick from the Union.

group_1.textLeft: Since Tamaki wished to mourn@the Magical Girls of Futatsugi,
it's only fair that I should extend the same courtesy,@given that we're about to team up.

group_1.textRight: I dunno.
I don't think mourning someone@out of courtesy is the same thing.

group_1.textLeft: It's not, of course. I don't feel the slightest bit@of sorrow for Ryo Midori or Ikumi Makino.

group_1.textCenter: Then why are you even here?

group_1.textRight: You say we're about to team up,@and then you come and insult the dead?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102101:effect_shake][flashEffect:flashWhite2]Gh...
...Enough.
Although I've agreed to join forces with the Union,@I still have a grudge against all of you.
I could kill you right here, you know...?

group_1.textRight: Why don't ya do it, Sis?
You'd give me a reason to fight and keep livin'.
Are you serious?

group_1.textLeft: ...No, I'm not so tactless as to fight over a grave.

group_1.textRight: Then get out.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102101:lipSynch_1][chara:102101:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_102921/vo_full_102903-10-21]Let me say something first.

group_1.textRight: What the...

group_1.textLeft: I may not be here to mourn,@but I did come here for a reason.

group_1.textRight: What, to laugh at the dead?

group_1.textLeft: No...
I feel bad for you, the leader of the South,@and these girls.
It wasn't only Iroha Tamaki who convinced@my people to join hands with the Union.
It was the deaths of these two as well.

group_1.textRight: What does that mean...?

group_1.textLeft: The Union suffered the loss of loved ones,@much like we did.
This is proof of that...
I'm sure this is going to come off as sarcastic,
but I've come to give thanks...

group_1.textRight: If you guys were just gonna@team up with us anyway...
Then what was the point in those two fighting...?@What was the point of them dying...?
What significance did their lives have?!

group_1.textLeft: If they hadn't done anything, we'd still@be stuck in a mess, wouldn't we...?

group_1.textRight: If that's what you're gonna say, I can't let@this slide with just a "thank you".
If you want to keep them alive, then you're@gonna have to carry their deaths with you!

group_1.textLeft: I cannot bear that weight.@However, I will do my best to support you.

group_1.textRight: Was all that crap about "support" really necessary?

group_1.textLeft: If we carry them with us as friends, it will be@harder to put them down later, won't it?
All we can do for now is lend our hands to assist,
even temporarily...

group_1.textRight: Well, I don't really wanna shoulder their burden,@'cause that's like admitting it's our fault.

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, Juri, can I say this one more time?

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Do NOT die.

group_1.textRight: Heh, what brings this on?
I got it already. I'm gonna hold@out until we save Lil' Sis.

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "In my case, no matter how many@  times people ask me what kinda@  future I want, I'm afraid my@  nature's gonna get in the way."]
[textBlack:  "To put it bluntly... I can't hold back@  my anger, and even when I try, the@  voltage keeps buildin' 'til I explode.@  I'd have to change that before@  I can do anythin' else."]
[textBlack:  "It feels great to go up against@  strong opponents and kick their@  asses, but it's 'cause of me and@  the others that people end up@  like Lil' Sis, right?"]
[textBlack:  "This ain't about squarin' up against@  other people. I'm talking about doin'@  something about my own nature."]

[textBlack:  "So if there's anythin' Juri the Great@  wants, it's to take care of herself@  first. If I don't, I'll either have@  to go find a war somewhere to keep@  fightin', or give up on my own life."]

[textBlack:  "And I mean, I've been allowed to@  do whatever I want, so I don't have@  any major regrets about my life.@  But after spendin' time with Sis,@  Lil' Sis, and the Horse,@  I've started seein' the world@  a little differently."]
[textBlack:  "Funny enough, I've learned@  how much fun it is to hang out@  with my friends."]
[textBlack:  "That's why I'm gonna save Lil' Sis@  and peace outta this world before@  any regrets can start pilin' up.@  It'd be too hard for me otherwise."]
